channel.title: GLITCH ABUSE! Do not work anymore
channel.description:
Want to make sure everyone around you crashes?? Then hit Ctrl+alt+M to make this sign µ and then hit enter, everyone whit public chat on will crash! if that do not work use this alt code [quote="haticks"]alt + 230 is the alt code.[/quote] This also works in clan chats! I bet jagex will fix this veeery fast, so if you want to have some fun, you should do it now! be smart, don't use your main! They are now working on it!
Mod Stevew Jagex Mod 25-Feb-2009 22:42:19 We have a specialist team investigating the issue, and we will let you know if there is any information that needs passing on. We are busy right now confirming the problem, and trying to establish the root cause of the crashes, so that we can implement a fix if needed. Although we still need to do some investigation, it does seem that the crashes are linked to the public chat function. If you have been experiencing crashes, you may find, that switching all chat settings to 'off', will reduce or completely stop the crashes. Although not ideal, this will enable you to keep playing until we fully rectify the issue. Finally, as we are fully aware of this issue, there is no need to submit a bug report about these crashes, similarly, there is no need to let us know about this issue on the forums (although we appreciate your help of course!). We know this must be very frustrating for you, which is why we are working flat out to put things right! Thanks for your patience, Steve
So hurry up and join in on making the game unplayable for all the others :D

item.title: GLITCH ABUSE! Do not work anymore

item.description:
@jme wrote:

@dragonfur: Why are you even here? I swear half your posts are just quoting people, saying “<3” “epic” “win” etc.
You don’t even know why people were quoting it with win, because I removed the picture a long time ago and it still wouldn’t have made sense unless you were on IRC.

Read full topic

item.title: GLITCH ABUSE! Do not work anymore
item.dc:creator: @Ske Ske
item.description:
@Ske wrote:

[quote=“haticks, post:32, topic:264454”][quote author=Ske link=topic=349203.msg2685021#msg2685021 date=1235610313]

I will now tear this story to shreds.

[quote]i crash them they say wooow how you do that.[/quote] You both would have been logged out.
Don’t say you logged back in, because it takes you off the game client, and you would have switched worlds because the client picks a random world for you.

the people who were following me didnt crash because they ran away at “1”

I doub’t the made it far enough before you typed 1, and alt 230. But you never know.

[quote]Then the victim started following me and so on…[/quote] You both would have logged out, and most likely ended up in different worlds.

TeleNubby, go ahead, i really don’t mind. Only reason im continuing this is because the past couple days Ske has proven himself to be a real dick.

we both been logged out.
logging back in takes like…what 5seconds?
i pick the normal world, in this case it was world 3, so it wasnt random?? yes are you following this?
both logged out, both logged into same world? okay? understand? ??

edit: i wish i didnt mention that on the first page :mad:
[/quote]Im done with this after this post:

You would have been directed to the error occurred page, then would have gone back to the home page, free user, load client, and pick world 3 again. Now he would have done the same thing, but odds are he wouldn’t have picked world 3 again if hes getting kicked from that world.

Either way Ske, your a dick. Im done now, bye.[/quote]
ah finally, bye

Read full topic
